body.p: Signature marks are represented by the value "sig" in the @type attribute of the <fw> element. They can be at the beginning or end of a page.
body.codeblock: <fw type="sig" place="bottom">[signature mark]</fw> <fw type="sig" place="top">[signature mark]</fw>
body.p: For catchwords, the value "catch" is in the @type attribute of the <fw> element. Catchwords can be placed both under the text area and under the footnote area (as a reading aid for continuous footnotes). In both cases, the position is specified by the value "bottom" in the @place attribute:

fig.codeblock: <fw place="bottom" type="sig"> <hi rendition="#fr">Er≈øter Theil D</hi> </fw> <fw place="bottom" type="catch"> <hi rendition="#fr">erwecket</hi> </fw> <lb/>

p.i: Source: Arndt, Johann: Von wahrem Christenthumb. Bd. 1. Magdeburg, 1610. [Facsimile 55]
